text: In-App Private Viewer: added ability to view Images from mobile devices from External Link.
In-App Private Viewer: speed up opening of big PDF files.
Improved User Experience: icons for PDFs and thumbnails for Images are dispayed around the application to find items easily.
Cybersecurity: updated old libraries and packages to fix potential vulnerabilities.
Bug Fixes & Other Improvements for In-App Viewer for Images, Videos and PDFs.
